duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead complex strategic initiatives across global programs with cross-functional stakeholders.
Design policies to deliver world-class customer service experience.
Tackle ambiguous strategic challenges using data and customer insights to inform decision-making.
Design, implement, and deliver successful customer experience programs and strategies.
Work efficiently and effectively under pressure, prioritizing tasks and managing workload.
Ensure customers receive the highest level of service and play a key role in customer satisfaction.
Drive automation, standardization, and process implementation to improve program requirements.
Own program strategy and end-to-end delivery.
Deliver projects within scope, time, budget, and quality.
